column4: Hey guys,  I can't seem to get sound comming from my flash player in firefox any ideas?
have you checked ubuntuguide.org?
there's a section about sound config there
I'll check it
that would be under hardware right? think I remember something there now but having trouble finding it
http://ubuntuguide.org/#configuresoundproperly
sweet thanks man I'm on it
does anybody has dbus-1 issues described in http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?threadid=27087?
I'd like to know if there's a solution or work on it...
success?
thanks for the sound help now you can play duck hunt also http://www.johnnyslack.com/duckhunt/
lol
all the sounds work now
well done!
I was having trouble with sound on tuxracer think that will fix it also?
You'll tell :)
yep it works now
it's working great except for some reason my penguin keeps turning left
have you gave beer to him?
learning linux has brought me to drinking but in my drunken maddness I doubt I've given him any
hasn't your left cursor key sticked then :)?
nope I think it makes him turn left evenmore when I have it down
seveas yeah man brings back memories
got him to stop running left
